#summary 線性版面配置
#sidebar SideUi

= XML宣告 =

由上而下的版面配置
{{{
<LinearLayout
    android:orientation="vertical"
    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
    android:layout_height="fill_parent"
    >
    <!-- contained widgets -->
</LinearLayout>
}}}


由左而右的版面配置
{{{
<LinearLayout
    android:orientation="horizontal"
    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
    android:layout_height="fill_parent"
    >
    <!-- contained widgets -->
</LinearLayout>
}}}
